named-query.name: findByBarCode
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.barCode = :code

named-query.name: findByName
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.description like :searchName

named-query.name: numberProductsPerFilterDescription
named-query.query: select count(p.id) from Product p where p.description like :searchValue

named-query.name: findByCategory
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.category = :category

named-query.name: findByBrand
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.brand = :brand

named-query.name: findByUnitMeasurement
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.unitMeasurement = :unitMeasurement
